nodes.name: Embedded Databases
properties: These databases are integrated directly into mobile applications.

nodes.name: Client-Server Databases
properties: The mobile device acts as a client that connects to a remote server, where the main database resides.

nodes.name: NoSQL Databases
properties: These databases are designed to handle unstructured data and provide more flexibility than traditional SQL databases.

nodes.name: Cloud-based Databases
properties: These databases are hosted on cloud platforms and provide managed services for data storage and access.
